title: Bruce Pearl joins the show!
description:
Auburn head coach Bruce Pearl joins Jalen & Jacoby to chop it up about his team's current run to the top of the rankings, potential #1 pick Jabari Smith's game, and what makes it special, and how he doesn't want to leave Auburn, because he doesn't want to find a new barber. Plus, the guys talk Aaron Rodgers's latest cryptic tweets, Chris Paul's injury, and doing a backflip when you're down 40. Tap in! 
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
